name: Firefighters - Rescue Patrol
description:
Almost every kid at least ever dreamed of becoming a real hero and saving lives. And now you have such an opportunity. With great joy, we present our new game "Firefighters - Rescue Patrol".
When a fire rages, and fire devours a floor by floor, the most courageous and brave people - firefighters - always come to the rescue. Our game will help you feel like a real fireman, help to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of this wonderful profession, will show the challenges and difficulties that professional firefighters face every day.
In our development game you will have many difficulties and dangers, to show resourcefulness and ingenuity. You will need to quickly equip the necessary tools with a fire truck and a fire helicopter and hurry to where your help is needed.
And now, there was an alarm signal, somewhere there was a big trouble. Your fire truck is ready for departure. Save the lives of cute little animals that are in a burning house. Managing the helicopter take away from the raging sea of ​​disobedient kids who are in a dangerous situation and extinguish forest fires. Perform the most dangerous and difficult tasks, because the main qualities of a real firefighter are quick reaction, organization and readiness to work.
Our games for children allow your child to be in the role of a real fireman, teach you how to handle fire, show what fire safety and fire protection are, and teach you how to behave properly in case of a fire. In the future, these skills can help them.
You can download our fire games for free. Well, go ahead! The alarm sounded, the city in trouble. Go and save everyone who needs your help so much.



Be sure to visit our website at http://yovogames.com
